title: iDigital
description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from iDigital, skipping any feeds with errors.

items.title: ‘I’m 15 years older’: My second wife says she will pass my estate onto my sons. What could go wrong?
items.description: “My wife is probably one of the most honest persons I’ve ever known.”

items.title: ‘I am suspicious’: My father died, leaving me $250,000. My brother says it’s all gone. What can I do?
items.description: “My brother and I are named as co-executors in his will.”

items.title: ‘She’s kept him afloat’: I’m 78 and leaving my daughter, 41, my life savings, but her partner doesn’t pay rent. What do I do?
items.description: “He keeps losing jobs and going on unemployment.”

items.title: Globalization isn’t over — but now it’s going to make Americans poorer
items.description: Trump’s tariffs can be effective only if other nations don’t retaliate. That isn’t happening.
